00007 class som_window
00008 {
00009 public:
00010     som_window(unsigned w, unsigned h, const std::string& name)
00011         : width_(w), height_(h)
00012     {
00013         window_ptr = boost::make_shared<sf::RenderWindow>(sf::VideoMode(width_, height_), name);
00014     }
00015 
00016     void main_loop(som::map& map)
00017     {
00018         window_ptr->SetFramerateLimit(30);
00019         while (window_ptr->IsOpened())
00020         {
00021             sf::Event Event;
00022             while (window_ptr->GetEvent(Event))
00023             {
00024                 // Close window : exit
00025                 if (Event.Type == sf::Event::Closed)
00026                     window_ptr->Close();
00027 
00028                 // Escape key : exit
00029                 if ((Event.Type == sf::Event::KeyPressed) && (Event.Key.Code == sf::Key::Escape))
00030                     window_ptr->Close();
00031             }
00032             display_map(map);
00033             window_ptr->Display();
00034         }
00035     }
00036 
00037     void display_map(som::map& map)
00038     {
00039         unsigned map_size = map.get_size();
00040         unsigned dx = width_ / map_size;
00041         unsigned dy = height_ / map_size;
00042 
00043         for (unsigned i = 0; i < map_size; ++i)
00044         {
00045             for (unsigned j = 0; j < map_size; ++j)
00046             {
00047                 boost::numeric::ublas::vector<double> weights = map(i,j)->get_weights();
00048                 sf::Shape r = sf::Shape::Rectangle(i*dx, j*dy, i*dx+dx, j*dy+dy, sf::Color(weights[0]*255, weights[1]*255, weights[2]*255));
00049                 window_ptr->Draw(r);
00050             }
00051         }
00052     }
00053 
00054 private:
00055     unsigned width_, height_;
00056     boost::shared_ptr<sf::RenderWindow> window_ptr;
00057 };
00058

00061     unsigned map_size = 4;
00062     unsigned sample_size = 3; // rgb colors (3 components)
00063 
00064     som::map map(map_size, sample_size, boost::make_shared<som::euclidean_distance>());
00065     std::cout << map;
00066
